name: Dice By Dice
description:
Number two, listen carefully! Defeat these evil dices, they are trying to corrupt the database, destroy them all!

Anonymous King: @anonymouskingoficial
Programmer: KingLucky  
Pixel art: Harley - @zonadepixels


How to play:
At the beginning of each wave you have a colored dice, roll it and test your luck with the power-ups!
Colors: 
Blue - Shield 
Green - Restore life 
Yellow - Faster and stronger bullets 
Orange - Fastest Enemies 
Red- More enemies and faster enemies 
Purple - Attract enemies
D or right arrow- Walk right 
E or left arrow- Walk left 
Space - Jump 
K - Throwing Dice
